message.raw:
Allow labscript device drivers to be located in any importable location.
The list of locations searched is configurable in labconfig as a comma-delimited
list of import names as the configuration setting [DEFAULT]/user_devices,
which if not present defaults to 'user_devices'.

TODO: make the installer set this configuration setting in new labconfig files
to its default value, and make it create the userlib/user_devices folder.
